com.twilio4j.twiml.Redirect

  • Packages that use Redirect 
    Package Description
    com.twilio4j.twiml  
    com.twilio4j.twism  

    • Uses of Redirect in com.twilio4j.twiml

      Methods in com.twilio4j.twiml that return Redirect 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Redirect<E> Redirect.method(Method method)
      The 'method' attribute takes the value 'GET' or 'POST'.
      Redirect<E> Redirect.methodGET()
      Convenience function that does the same as method(Method.GET).
      Redirect<E> Redirect.methodPOST()
      Convenience function that does the same as method(Method.POST).
      Redirect<E> DeclarativeComposer.redirect(E nextState)
      Inserts a Redirect verb into your TwiML.
